ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope the hero only drops a Stand. Mino axe (at least the 8 times I killed him) and mel never dropped anything special (killed him 4 times).
ygData.messageBody:
Nope the hero only drops a Stand. Mino axe (at least the 8 times I killed
him) and mel never dropped anything special (killed him 4 times).


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel McLarney [mailto:d-m@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:53 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com; EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon

From: Daniel McLarney <d-m@...>

I have a question,
I am a 22 lvl wizzard with a pretty high INT, and so far I made 6 cams, 4
mechanical lockpicks,2 stalking probes, 5 compasses which are trivial but
my skill is not going up. Any ideas? Has anybody ever made a collapsable
fishing pole or a spy glass?


I have a theory on where other books may be, I think Hero or Meldrath drops
em (maybe) brcuase the 2 I have talk about mino's through the whole book.

Well lmk
Dan
